column1: Good thing I get the flu vaccine every year... Nothing for Covid19.

Thanks to the several completely different analyses of the Coronavirus situation on the WH podium, I am now certain we have no response and it will be a disaster.

Thank you Mr. Trump for solving the housing crisis
